00020 
00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Dialogs {
00035     public class AddPeer : GladeDialog {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PRIVATE Members
00038         // ============================================
00039         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.CheckButton checkSecureAuth;
00040         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryUserName;
00041         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.SpinButton spinPort;
00042         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Expander expander;
00043         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryIP;
00044         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Image image;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PUBLIC Constructors
00048         // ============================================
00050         public AddPeer() : base("dialog", "AddPeerDialog.glade") {
00051             checkSecureAuth.Toggled += new EventHandler(OnCheckSecureAuthToggled);
00052 
00053             this.Dialog.Response += new ResponseHandler(OnResponse);
00054 
00055             // Widget.Sensitive
00056             OnCheckSecureAuthToggled(checkSecureAuth, null);
00057 
00058             // Initialize Dialog Image
00059             this.image.Pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("Network", 96);
00060         }
00061 
00062         // ============================================
00063         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handler
00064         // ============================================
00065         private void OnCheckSecureAuthToggled (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00066             CheckButton checkButton = sender as CheckButton;
00067             bool status = !checkButton.Active;
00068             this.expander.Sensitive = status;
00069             this.expander.Expanded = status;
00070         }
00071 
00072         private void OnResponse (object sender, ResponseArgs args) {
00073             if (args.ResponseId != ResponseType.Ok)
00074                 return;
00075 
00076             // Check UserName
00077             if (Username == null) {
00078                 string title = "Invalid UserName";
00079                 string message = "Please Set UserName, Null Username Found";
00080                 Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title, message);
00081                 return;
00082             }
00083 
00084             // Check Insecure Auth Forms
00085             if (SecureAuthentication == false) {
00086                 if (Ip == null) {
00087                     Username = null;
00088                     string title = "Invalid Ip";
00089                     string message = "Please Set Ip, Null Ip Found";
00090                     Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title, message);
00091                     return;
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 if (Port == 0) {
00095                     Username = null;
00096                     string title = "Invalid Port";
00097                     string message = "Please Set Port, Null Port Found";
00098                     Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title, message);
00099                     return;
00100                 }
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         // ============================================
00105         // PUBLIC Properties
00106         // ============================================
00108         public string Username {
00109             set { entryUserName.Text = value; }
00110             get { return(TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryUserName.Text) ? null : entryUserName.Text); }
00111         }
00112 
00114         public string Ip {
00115             set { entryIP.Text = value; }
00116             get { return(TextUtils.IsEmpty(entryIP.Text) ? null : entryIP.Text); }
00117         }
00118 
00120         public int Port {
00121             set { spinPort.Value = value; }
00122             get { return(spinPort.ValueAsInt); }
00123         }
00124 
00126         public bool SecureAuthentication {
00127             set { checkSecureAuth.Active = value; }
00128             get { return(checkSecureAuth.Active); }
00129         }
00130     }
00131 }
